original: Alaric de Wyverngarde saw Aria Steelwind exiting the Common Room. He saw that a fire had started there. But when he asked Steelwind what was going on, she cast a transmutation spell on him. This spell blurred his vision and put him in a daze. His ears were ringing, and he was unable to speak or walk properly. He could only move by crawling on the ground. Strangely, no one saw him while he was in this state.
